data.name: Galaxy Angels - Erica Alone in Space
data.detailed_description:
This is a story based DLC pack, it will add a new story to the game that you can play separately to the main storyline.

The story will follow the protagonist Erica as she is tasked with a mission from high command to investigate a strange nebulae that is on the sensors near to the ship. Setting out alone Erica has no idea what she will find or why High command thinks it is worth investigation.

This DLC is available to purchase now, however it will not be made available until August 22nd.
(Roughly two weeks after the main games official release)

data.short_description: A new story awaits Erica, as she must investigate strange readings close to the ship.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
